definition[0]: if vegetables, seeds, or plants sprout, they start to grow, producing shoots, buds, or leaves
example[0]: Move the pots outside when the seeds begin to sprout.
example[1]: Trees were starting to sprout new leaves.
definition[1]: to appear suddenly in large numbers
example[2]: Office blocks are sprouting up everywhere.
definition[2]: if something such as hair sprouts or if you sprout it, it starts to grow
example[3]: Jim seemed to have sprouted a beard.
definition[3]: a small green vegetable like a very small cabbage
definition[4]: a new growth on a plant
definition[5]: an alfalfa seed which has grown a stem and is eaten
